ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Hour is coming but I have concealed it so that every self can be repaid for its efforts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily the Hour (of the great change) is about to come. I keep it secret that every soul may be rewarded for its endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Hour of Resurrection is coming. I have willed to keep the time of its coming hidden so that everyone may be recompensed in accordance with his effort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Although it is certain that the Day of Judgment will come, I prefer to keep it almost a secret so that every soul will receive the recompense for what it has done (on its own).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “The Last Day will surely come – it was close that I hide it from all – in order that every soul may get the reward of its effort.” (He revealed it to His Prophets, so that people may fear and get ready. The exact time is not revealed to the people.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the Hour is coming -- and I am almost hiding it -- that every person may be rewarded for that which he strives."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the hour is coming-- I am about to make it manifest-- so that every soul may be rewarded as it strives:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Hour is coming; I would conceal it that every soul may be recompensed for its labours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the Hour is surely coming. But I will to keep it hidden, that every soul may be rewarded for that which it striveth (to achieve).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Hour is coming. But I choose to keep it hidden, so that every human being may be recompensed in accordance with his labours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the Hour is coming--I wish to conceal it - in Order that every one may be requited according to that which he hath endeavoured.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Hour is bound to come: I will have it hidden, so that every soul may be rewarded for its endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily the Hour is coming - My design is to keep it hidden - for every soul to receive its reward by the measure of its Endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Hour is coming and My Will is to keep it hidden that every person may be rewarded for that which he strives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Hour is coming. I almost conceal it, so that every soul will be recompensed for its labors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Hour is coming—but I keep it almost hidden—so that each soul will be paid for what it endeavors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:15] The Hour is assuredly coming. [But] I will to keep it hidden, from mankind — and its nearness [in time] will manifest itself to them through its signs — so that every soul may be requited, thereupon, for what it strives for, of good or evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the Hour is surely coming) the Hour will surely take place. (But I will to keep it hidden) so how would I reveal it to any created being, (that every soul) whether it is righteous or sinner (may be rewarded for that which it striveth (to achieve)) whether it is good or evil.
